title: 11/30/21 DPS Hour 2 Marcus Spears
itunes:title: 11/30/21 DPS Hour 2 Marcus Spears
description:
Marcus Spears talks to Dan about the new hire at LSU. Marcus says that LSU is the best opening that was available.
